Articles.Content: Hello! This is the thread is the place where I will post all of my flights from my K-SASA project (Kerbal-Swedish Aero and Space Alliance)! Feel free to msg me about stuff, and to ask stuff, and suggest stuff... Any type of stuff!

Howdy, space cowboys! This is the place where I will post all of our flights at the K-SASA project. Before you coninue, I wanna question you some things:

1. Do you want me to play in sandbox, career, permadeath etc. (You can choose that I'll make one career, and one sandbox mode world.

2. Do you want me to reqruit other players, as engineers (designers), scientists (mod makers), and stuff.

Also, if you wanna join (you might not be able to if the majority of the people answers no to question 2), just reply to this thread, and do something like this:

Name: BriXman

Country: Sweden

Skype (not necessary): ludden1000

Age (not necessary): Secret

Favourite colour: Lime-green

Have you ever been in a company like this before?: No.

How long have you been playing KSP?: Since 0.19.

Do you have any questions?: Why are kerbals green?

Please note that I live in Sweden, and we have the timezone GMT +1:00, so I might not be able to answer that fast.

Now let's get to the story!

In the year 2056, swedish scientists looked FAAAAAAR out in space, and noticed a small green and blue dot. The kerbals did the same. The swedish named the planet Kerbin, and the kerbals named the new plante Eert. But Earth sounds better, so they changed that. They established contact, and talked to Jeb for several hours, about his girl problems. After that, they was working hard on making a logo of their organization. The swedish made this: (I can't get the pic into this place, but as soon as I get it, I will put it there), and the kerbals made a picture of a panda on a bus. I know, wierd. They chose the swedish one... And as soon as that was done, they started working on their first rocket...

And that's all I have currently, because I haven't decided sandbox or career yet. But, yeah! Maybe I'll do both!

Flights:

(There's nothing here yet, but as soon as I get started, this will be filled up, like this:

Example 1. Mission: To establish a com-sat in LKO. Mission Outcome: Successful/Cancelled/Failed/Ongoing

So yeah! That's all I have right now! So, basicly, bye, bye, see ya in space!

I've decided, that this place will just be the update tread. All the flights will be at another blog, at this link: http://k-sasaflights.blogspot.com/

Hey, I've also decided to play in Sandbox mode, couse then I won't have to build small, useless ships just to get science. Although I'll maybe do another Career mode one too later, we'll see. Well, thanks for reading! See ya in space!

Nope! It's not!

Sorry, but I know now, how to upload images! Kinda... Well, sorry, you might think I'm stupid now, but I'm just gonna create an Imgur account, and everything will be fine. Although, there might not be a lot of images, but if you wanna watch all missions, there will be a video on my youtube channel, BriXmanGameNerd, for every mission! Ka blaam! Here's the mighty link: http://www.youtube.com/user/BriXmanGameNerd
Join B.R.I.Xco instead! It's one of the biggest companies at this forum and is very friendly.
